title: Palo Alto Battlefield National Historical Park: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore        Palo Alto Battlefield's visitor center bookstore is run by Western National Parks Association. NPS   Â    Western National Parks Association  Since 1938 the nonprofit Western National Parks Association (WNPA) supported 67 parks across the West, developing products, services, and programs that enrich the visitor experience. Our WNPA bookstore carries Junior Ranger gear, shirts, hats, magnets, pins, patches, and tokens. We also carry books on various topics including local history, the U.S-Mexican War, the Civil War and much more. Please note there is no concession stand or soda machine available so plan accordingly. Membership Discounts WNPA offers a 15% discount to members and a 20% discount to members over 62. You can apply for membership online or in the store. Educator Discount WNPA offers a 20% educator discount. No verification is required. Educators of all levels, including home schools, and scout leaders are eligible. Clearance Discounts Inventory items may be discounted at times for damaged or slow moving inventory. These percentages can vary depending on the circumstances.
